content.text:
[@lancew](@W87GwaaxNj0PSBbtc5qUm/A/xOO8AWPdNtJn6hzR8s0=.ed25519)

Are you using the system Electron in the above comment (`electron index.js`) or the Node modules (`npm start`)? It may not matter, but I'm trying to figure out what that common denominator is, if any. I've read through the Electron code and I have no idea why stack dumping fixes the issue, but I added it to `/etc/environment` because I'm lazy.

[@mix](@ye+QM09iPcDJD6YvQYjoQc7sLF/IFhmNbEqgdzQo3lQ=.ed25519)

Speaking of Arch breakage... if you have a few minutes would you mind taking a look at https://github.com/ssbc/scuttle-invite/pull/8? I hate to bother you, but patchbay + patchbay-dark-crystal + scuttle-dark-crystal have been broken on Node 10 for a bit.
